Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Sociologic \So`ci*o*log"ic\, Sociological \So`ci*o*log"ic*al\a. Of or pertaining to sociology, or social science. -- {So`ci*o*log"ic*al*ly}, adv. [1913 Webster]
sociological adj : of or relating to or determined by sociology; "sociological studies"
